snippet: The Supreme Court is expected to rule soon on the constitutionality of the partially implemented Affordable Care Act, an increasingly complicated, costly and uncertain issue for business owners.
abstract: The Supreme Court is expected to rule soon on the constitutionality of the partially implemented Affordable Care Act, an increasingly complicated, costly and uncertain issue for business owners.

headline.main: Business Owners Try to Make Sense of Health Care

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
